info.title: Zip Code Data API
info.description: The Zip Code API provides United States zip code data with a comprehensive data model in JSON format. Using REST design, this API can help you build zip validations, city searches, distance calculations, radius searches and many other key functions for your applications.

get.description: Returns a list of zip codes. Results are always paginated. Visit the [Zip Code Data API](https://www.metadapi.com/API-Products/API-Product-Details/zip-code-api) product page for information on how to get an API key.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset is the position in the dataset to start retrieval of records.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of records to return in each page.

parameters.name: zipcode
parameters.description: 5 Digit Zip Code query parameter. Can have multiple values (separated by comma).

parameters.name: uspsMainCityKey
parameters.description: Parameter for USPS City / Town key identifier for the main city of the zip code.

parameters.name: uspsCarrierRouteSortCode
parameters.description: Parameter for carrier route sort code.

parameters.name: uniqueZipNameInd
parameters.description: Parameter for unique zip name indicator.

get.description: Gets the distance (in miles and kilometers) between 2 zip codes passed as parameters. There are 2 mandatory query parameters (zipCode1 and zipCode2).

count.description: Number of zip codes found in the radius

zipCode.description: 5 Digit Zip Code. Zone Improvement Plan.

distanceKm.description: Distance to query parameter zip code in kilometers

distanceMi.description: Distance to query parameter zip code in miles

errors.title: Uom
errors.detail: Valid uom values must be mi or km

errors.title: radius
errors.detail: Radius Distance must be less than 322 kilometers or 200 miles

example-1.message: Access denied due to missing subscription key. Make sure to include subscription key when making requests to an API.

403.description: Quota Exceeded. The error message will display how long in dd:hh:mi:ss for the quota to be reset.

get.description: Endpoint that returns the zip codes that fall within the specified radius of another zip code. The returned zip codes are sorted by distance.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius distance.  Max 322 km or 200 mi

first.description: Link to the first group of records from API call.

next.description: Link to next set of results from API call.

prev.description: Link to the previous set of records from API call.

count.description: Total number of records of the response. Note: the data object always has a limit number of records retrieved.

offset.description: Offset position of where the first record returned.

limit.description: Total number of records returned in the data array. Specified by limit query parameter.

msaName.description: Name of the defined MSA code.

states.description: Array with states and counties that make up MSA Group

stateFipsCode.description: Federal Information Processing Standards 2 digit assigned code.

counties.description: Array with counties related to MSA group in the state.

countyFipsCode.description: FIPS code assigned to the county of the main city of the zip code.

uspsCountyName.description: Name of the county of the main city for the zip code. USPS Standard.

get.description: This end point lists all the Metropolitan and Micropolitan Statistical Areas in the United States with the corresponding states and counties that make up the group.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of records to return in each page. Max value: 50.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset is the position in the dataset to start retrieval of records.

count.description: Total number of records of the response. Note: the data object always has a limit number of records retrieved.

msaName.description: Name of the defined MSA code.

states.description: Array with states and counties that make up MSA Group

stateFipsCode.description: Federal Information Processing Standards 2 digit assigned code.

counties.description: Array with counties related to MSA group in the state.

countyFipsCode.description: FIPS code assigned to the county of the main city of the zip code.

uspsCountyName.description: Name of the county of the main city for the zip code USPS Standard.

get.description: Gets the details of a single Metropolitan Statistical Area code passed as a path parameter.

Example 1.message: Access denied due to invalid subscription key. Make sure to provide a valid key for an active subscription.

value.message: Access denied due to missing subscription key. Make sure to include subscription key when making requests to an API.

get.description: Endpoint used to validate license key only. Returns 204 on Success

Sample Zip Code Response.msaName: Los Angeles-Long Beach-Anaheim, CA Metro Area

zipCode.description: 5 Digit Zip Code. Zone Improvement Plan.

uspsMainCityKey.description: USPS City / Town key identifier for the main city of the zip code.

uspsMainCityName.description: USPS City / Town Name for the main city of the zip code. USPS Upper Case Format.

titleCaseCityName.description: USPS City / Town Name for the main city of the zip code. Title Case Format.

zipClassificationCode.description: Code provided by USPS for the type of Zip Code it represents.  P = PO Box Zip, U = Unique Zip, M = APO/FPO Military Zip , null (not provided by USPS),N = Non-Unique Zip.

zipClassificationDesc.description: Description of the zip classification code.   P = PO Box Zip, U = Unique Zip, M = APO/FPO Military Zip , null (not provided by USPS), = Non-Unique Zip.

uspsFacilityCode.description: Facility code provided by the USPS. B=Branch, C=Community Post Office, N = Non-Postal Community Name, former postal facility or place name, P= Post Office, S=Station, U = Urbanization

uspsFacilityName.description: USPS Facility Name  B=Branch, C=Community Post Office, N = Non-Postal Community Name, former postal facility or place name, P= Post Office, S=Station, U = Urbanization

uspsCityMailingInd.description: City names with the City State Mailing Name indicator flag set to True are considered part of a complete and standardized address; city names with the flag set to false  file should not be used in a complete and standardized address.

uspsDeliveryCode.description: Determines if the zip code city has Carrier Routes.

uspsDeliveryDesc.description: Determines if the zip code city has Carrier Routes.

uspsCarrierRouteSortCode.description: Code for the available carrier route.

uspsCarrierRouteRateSortDesc.description: Description for the carrier route code.

uniqueZipNameInd.description: True = Unique Zip Code Name. False the zip code name is not unique.

uspsFinanceNumber.description: USPS Provided Finance Number. This code is assigned to postal service facilities.

stateFipsCode.description: Federal Information Processing Standards 2 digit assigned code.

countyFipsCode.description: FIPS code assigned to the county of the main city of the zip code.

uspsCountyName.description: Name of the county of the main city for the zip code.

titleCaseCountyName.description: Main County Name in Title Case

landAreaMi2.description: Zip Code Land area in Square Miles

waterAreaMi2.description: Zip Code Water Area in Square Miles

landAreaKm2.description: Zip Code Land Area in square kilometers.

waterAreaKm2.description: Zip Code water area in Square kilometers.

divisionCode.description: Division Code. Part of the geographical hierarchy of the US provided by the united states census.

divisionName.description: Division Name. Part of the geographical hierarchy of the US provided by the united states census.

regionCode.description: Region Code. Part of the geographical hierarchy of the US provided by the united states census.

regionName.description: Region Name. Part of the geographical hierarchy of the US provided by the united states census.

msaName.description: Name of the defined MSA code.

cityAliases.description: Array that contains all the city aliases for the given zip code.

uspsCityKey.description: USPS City / Town key identifier city of the zip code.

uspsCityName.description: USPS City / Town Name for the zip code. All uppercase.

titleCaseCityName.description: USPS City / Town Name for the zip code.

uspsCityAbbr.description: Main city abbreviation provided by USPS. Null if not provided. Uppercase.

uspsCityMailingInd.description: City names with the City State Mailing Name indicator flag set to True are considered part of a complete and standardized address; city names with the flag set to false  file should not be used in a complete and standardized address.

uspsMainCityInd.description: If true, the city name and code is the main zip code city name.  (Preferred USPS city).

zipCodeStatistics.description: Available statistics by year of the Zip Code.

totalPopulation.description: Total population of the zip code

malePopulation.description: Total Male population of the zip code.

femalePopulation.description: Total female population of the zip code.

first.description: Link to the first group of records from API call.

next.description: Link to next set of results from API call.

prev.description: Link to the previous set of records from API call.

last.description: Link to last set of records from API call.

Errors.description: List of Errors generated by the request.

errors.title: Invalid Path Parameter
errors.detail: Path Parameter: 33x09 Error Message: Invalid Zip Code Format. 5 character long, numbers only

meta.title: meta
meta.description: Response Metadata. Provides additional context about the data response.

count.description: Total number of records of the response. Note: the data object always has a limit number of records retrieved.

offset.description: Offset position of where the first record returned.

limit.description: Total number of records returned in the data array.

subscription-key.description: API Key provided by the metadapi subscription.
subscription-key.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key
